text: Jean Pazzi (7 August 1920 - 1982) was a French alpine skier. He competed in the men's downhill at the 1948 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:1982 deaths Category:French male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of France Category:Alpine skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:People from Alpes-Maritimes
title: Jean Pazzi
